front.title: Requirements for accessing data in network storage

abstract.t: The DECoupled Application Data Enroute (DECADE) working group isspecifying standardized interfaces for accessing in-network storagefrom applications to store, retrieve and manage data. The mainobjective is to provide a framework that is useful to P2Papplications, without excluding other, possibly related applicationsthat can benefit from accessing in-network storage. This memopresents Internet TV as a specific application scenario where accessto in-netork storage would be required and lists a set of concreterequirements that should be considered for the DECADE architectureand protocol specifications.
